title: IyaCare: An Integrated AI-IoT-Blockchain Platform for Maternal Health in Resource-Constrained Settings
summary: Maternal mortality in Sub-Saharan Africa remains critically high, accounting for 70% of global deaths despite representing only 17% of the world population. Current digital health interventions typically deploy artificial intelligence (AI), Internet of Things (IoT), and blockchain technologies in isolation, missing synergistic opportunities for transformative healthcare delivery.
